Paragraph.Text: Uses an Imbued Machine Block, a Sulphur Canister and a huge amount of power to create a bombs. These bombs can then be delivered by Bomber FALCORs to defeat large quantities of long-range CryoPlasm.
This machine requires hoppers holding at least 1 Sulphur Canisther and Imbued Machine Block to start the crafting process.
